item.description:
Dinner & or Dance to Momma Kicks

Saturday June 30th. Dinner 7 pm. Dance 9 pm.

Derrfield Country Club

Mammouth Rd. Manchester NH.

For North bound drivers: Exit 8 off of rt.93 is blocked.  So you will need to drive up to exit 9 and back. Cover charge is usually $5..

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Join Steve Ob1. and about 20 to 30 friends for dancing to one of the best dance Band the East. Come just to dance, or just to help us hold on to some seats and tables. We will be there for dinner and to hold seats and tables at 7. We usually sit on the left side as you walk into the Bar. No dress code. Park becomes hard to find much after 7 also.

Please, let me know as soon as possible. If you are joining us for dinner?try
item.how_to_find_us: Look for our Meetup sign on the left as you walk into the Bar.
item.name: Dinner &/or Dance to Momma Kicks
